title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 17.7 - Replacement plates and additional dealer and transporter plates
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 17.7 - Replacement plates and additional dealer and transporter plates

State Regulations

On and after January 1, 1973, any replacement plates or any
additional dealer or transporter plates which are issued will be reflectorized. Unless the plates are of a type for which a validation sticker on the plate is
required for 1973 and thereafter, or if the plates have the expiration embossed
thereon, the validation sticker which will be issued with such plates shall be
a windshield validation sticker. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
17.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
